availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Snider (Greenup County, KY, teacher and farmer)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, teacher and farmer. Virginia native. Married Mary Ann Cooley Snider in Lewis County on March 13, 1841. Father of Barbary Snider, Arnold Snider, Mary Snider, Esther Snider, Joshua Snider, John Snider, Lewis Lucinda Snider, and Roland T, Snider. Teacher in Lewis County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Greenup County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 2, p. 200A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 723.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film #000344051, p. 24.
Find A Grave, "James Snider (1897-1880)," Memorial #156525548, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/156525548 (accessed May, 26, 2017).
